title: Event Storming for integration clarity
summary: Facilitated modeling to make workflows, handoffs, and integration contracts visible and testable.

decisionGuidance.problemSolved: Hidden orchestration complexity (parallel flows, batch dependencies, rules) causes migration rework and outages.
whenToUse: Long-running workflows and batch jobs exist
whenNotToUse: The scope is a single, simple interface with clear documentation

gotchas: Workshops produce posters but no backlog
thingsToWatchOutFor.opinionatedGuidance: End each session with: contracts, owners, and migration slices that map to backlog items.

complexity.rationale: Requires cross-team participation and strong facilitation.
complexity.skillDemand: Facilitation plus enough technical knowledge to translate models into implementation slices.
complexity.operationalDemand: Moderate—improves downstream operability by making flows explicit.
complexity.toolingDemand: Whiteboarding tools + repo for contracts and decisions.

realWorldExample.approach: Modeled 2–3 critical flows and extracted event contracts and ownership.
realWorldExample.outcome: Reduced ambiguity and improved migration sequencing.
